title: PomoWear | Start Working
summary: Yet another pomo app for Android Wear. Say "OK Google, start working"

descriptionHTML:
Pomo Tracking application that seemlesly work with Android Wear.

Say "OK Google, start working" on your watch to start the application.

What is Pomo?
With this technique, you basically and systematically work like the following simple flow:
1. Decide on the task to be done
2. Start the pomo timer.
3. Work for 25 minutes on the task until the timer rings.
4. Take a short break (5 minutes)
5. After four pomi, take a longer break (15 minutes)

With its beautiful Material Design with cool animations, it can help you work effectively.

* No ads
* Beautiful design
* Simplicity

It can run on phones, tablets, watches and even Android TVs.
It can run on the watch itself offline, so you don't need your phone to be connected. However, when the phone app detects the app running on the watch, it syncs automagically.

And guess what, it is open source:
https://github.com/vngrs/PomoPomoAndroid

Please send you requests, bugs and complaints through email or using the below Trello board before giving a bad rating. Thank you.
https://trello.com/b/lU9UHl2B

Beautifully crafted in Istanbul, Turkey.

Pomodoro™ and Pomodoro Technique® are registered trademarks of Francesco Cirillo. This app is not affiliated with Francesco Cirillo.
comments: No Pause The dev is obviously going for minimalism here, no tracking and memory of any kind. That would suit certain people fine, I'm sure. But no pause function? That's not practical.
I like it. But.. Simple and no frills. But I wish you added option to get a break on a button. I don't always use 3 for long break ratio. I have to check time myself.
Rotten How can something so simple cause so many problems? Installed and started the app, created an endless loop of phone and wear crashes to the point I had to reset my devices.
Great app No settings, no noise. Simple and clear! Found it  in stackoverflow question. Please make apk size smaller. 6mb for what?
Like it Interface is so clean, no ads, good material design. I think the only missing part is that sometimes I do not hear the break time notification.
Bug The timer counts down 25min but shows it beginning from 55min. And Even the breaks 5min appears as 35min
recentChanges: Please send bugs errors to info@vngrs.com
